<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComGrid" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="83" height="99">
	<e:Group id="con" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="83" height="99">
		<e:Image id="jewel" width="83" height="99" x="0" y="0" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="prop" verticalCenter="8.5" anchorOffsetX="24" anchorOffsetY="25" horizontalCenter="0" width="48" height="50" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="skill_img" width="66" height="68" y="58" horizontalCenter="0.5" anchorOffsetX="33" anchorOffsetY="34"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComEmpty" width="200" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComBubble" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*"
        xmlns:item="item.*">
	<e:Group id="con" x="0" y="0" width="335" height="100">
		<e:Group id="conWord" width="335" anchorOffsetX="148" anchorOffsetY="-20" height="100" x="148" y="-20" scaleX="1"
		         scaleY="1">
			<e:Image id="bgDebug" source="pHelpMe_png" height="120" anchorOffsetX="167.5" anchorOffsetY="50" horizontalCenter="0"
			         width="335" y="50" rotation="180" scale9Grid="37,28,7,6" />
			<e:Image id="bgWord" source="pHelpMe_png" height="120" anchorOffsetX="167.5" anchorOffsetY="50" horizontalCenter="0"
			         scale9Grid="37,28,7,6" width="335" y="50" rotation="0" />
			<e:Image id="word" source="lang_guide_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComFloat" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*">
	<e:Group id="con" x="60.5" y="15" anchorOffsetX="60.5" anchorOffsetY="15">
		<e:Group id="conFloat" x="60.5" y="15" anchorOffsetX="60.5" anchorOffsetY="15">
			<e:Image id="float" anchorOffsetX="60.5" anchorOffsetY="15"
			          source="pBGspray_png" x="60.5" y="15"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComGuide" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*">
	<e:Image id="hand"  x="13.2" y="20.2" anchorOffsetX="13.2" anchorOffsetY="20.2" source="p_hand_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComLight" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="285" height="285">
	<e:Group id="con" x="0" y="0" width="285" height="285">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="warn" anchorOffsetX="35" anchorOffsetY="77" x="160" y="128" source="p_zhiyin1_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComProgress" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="con" y="0" x="0">
		<e:Group id="conBar">
			<e:Image source="icon3_wait_png"/>
			<e:Image id="bar" x="0" y="0" source="icon4_wait_png"/>
		</e:Group>

	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.GameScene" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*"
        xmlns:com="com.*" width="750" height="1334">
	<w:Config id="1699015f821" />
	<e:Image id="bg" source="p_bg_png" horizontalCenter="-3" verticalCenter="-2"/>
	<e:Image id="ui_grass" source="p_leaves_png" y="1096.57" right="0" anchorOffsetX="375" anchorOffsetY="55.5"/>
	<e:Group id="main_con" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" height="609">
		<e:Image id="main_frame" source="p_board_png" y="0" x="0"/>
		<e:Group id="main_grid" width="581" height="597" horizontalCenter="0" top="6">
			<e:Rect id="main_grid_mask" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x000000" visible="false"/>







		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="ui_con" anchorOffsetY="87" height="174" left="0" bottom="0" anchorOffsetX="375">
		<e:Image id="ui_frame" source="p_bottom_png" x="0" y="-64.95"/>
		<e:Group id="ui_round" width="239" height="239" x="0" y="-64.95">
			<e:Group id="ui_steps" x="71" y="139.07" width="100" height="100" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50">
				<e:Image id="ui_steps_title" source="p_bushu_title_png" y="0" x="27"/>
				<e:BitmapLabel id="ui_steps_label" font="p_bushu_fnt" text="24" anchorOffsetX="48" anchorOffsetY="33" y="67" x="50"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="star_bar" x="35" y="25" width="165" height="170">
				<e:Image id="star_bar_full" source="p_full_png" x="0" y="0"/>
				<e:Rect id="star_bar_mask" width="177.58" height="0" x="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" bottom="0"/>
				<e:Image id="ui_star1" source="p_star_s_png" x="148.1" y="88.24" anchorOffsetX="22.5" anchorOffsetY="20.5"/>
				<e:Image id="ui_star2" source="p_star_s_png" x="95.83" y="26.28" rotation="341.83" anchorOffsetX="22.5" anchorOffsetY="20.5"/>
				<e:Image id="ui_star3" source="p_star_s_png" x="33.77" y="12.67" rotation="329.17" anchorOffsetX="22.5" anchorOffsetY="20.5"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="ui_text" x="228" y="11.55">
			<e:Group id="ui_score" x="69.5" y="86" anchorOffsetX="69.5" anchorOffsetY="54.5">
				<e:Image source="p_score_board_png" x="1.52" y="30.4"/>
				<e:Image source="p_guanqia_1_png" x="36.52" y="-6.08"/>
				<e:BitmapLabel id="ui_score_label" font="p_score_fnt" text="0" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" horizontalCenter="0.5" bottom="16"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="ui_goals" x="163" y="0">
				<e:Image source="p_goal_board_png" x="0" y="33.5"/>
				<e:Image id="ui_goals_title" source="p_goal_png" x="173.5" y="46" anchorOffsetX="84.5" anchorOffsetY="46"/>
				<e:Group id="goals_con" x="42" y="55" width="262" height="73">
					<e:Group id="goal0" width="74" height="74" x="51" y="37" anchorOffsetX="37" anchorOffsetY="37">
						<e:Image id="goal0_jewel" x="2.25" y="6.25" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7" source=""/>
						<e:BitmapLabel id="goal0_value" x="37" y="40.75" font="p_goalnum_fnt" text="" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
						<e:Image id="goal0_done" source="p_done_png" x="58.5" y="58" anchorOffsetX="25.5" anchorOffsetY="21.5" visible="false"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group id="goal1" width="74" height="74" x="61" y="47" anchorOffsetX="37" anchorOffsetY="37">
						<e:Image id="goal1_jewel" x="2.25" y="6.25" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7" source=""/>
						<e:BitmapLabel id="goal1_value" x="37" y="40.75" text="" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" font="p_goalnum_fnt"/>
						<e:Image id="goal1_done" source="p_done_png" x="58.5" y="58" anchorOffsetX="25.5" anchorOffsetY="21.5" visible="false"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group id="goal2" width="74" height="74" x="71" y="57" anchorOffsetX="37" anchorOffsetY="37">
						<e:Image id="goal2_jewel" x="2.25" y="6.25" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7" source=""/>
						<e:BitmapLabel id="goal2_value" x="37" y="40.75" font="p_goalnum_fnt" text="" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
						<e:Image id="goal2_done" source="p_done_png" x="59" y="57.13" anchorOffsetX="25.5" anchorOffsetY="21.5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center"/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>




	<!--<e:Group id="conParticles" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false">
	</e:Group>-->

	<!--<e:Group id="conFloat" x="0" width="100%" height="82%" bottom="0">
	<e:Rect id="floatDebug" width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0x00ff00" fillAlpha="0.3" x="0" y="0" visible="false" />
</e:Group>
-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiEmpty" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiFirst" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<!--<e:Rect id="bg" width="750" height="150" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x2f3651" fillAlpha="0.5" />-->
	<e:Group id="conLogo" anchorOffsetX="334" anchorOffsetY="272.5" y="272.5" x="334">
		<e:Group id="gLogo" x="278" y="227" scaleX="0.4" scaleY="0.4" anchorOffsetX="278" anchorOffsetY="227">
			<e:Image id="logo" y="0" x="0"  source="p_logo_png"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="conBtn" anchorOffsetX="168" anchorOffsetY="48" y="348" x="168">
		<e:Group id="gBtn" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" x="210" y="60" anchorOffsetX="210" anchorOffsetY="60">
			<e:Image id="btn" x="0" y="0"  source="p_download_png"/>

		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiStart" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*" width="750" height="1334">
	<e:Rect id="black_bg" width="750" height="1334" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
	<e:Group id="con" y="667" horizontalCenter="0" anchorOffsetX="271" anchorOffsetY="353">
		<e:Image id="bg" source="p_tutorial_board_png" width="542" height="706" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Image id="main_bg" source="p_board_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="327.06" anchorOffsetY="0" height="339.9" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-83"/>
		<e:Group id="main_con" anchorOffsetX="0" width="415" anchorOffsetY="0" height="428" horizontalCenter="-0.5" verticalCenter="-82.5" scaleX="0.76" scaleY="0.76">
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiEnd" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*">
    <e:Image id="bg" source="p_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
    <e:Image id="leaves1" source="p_leaves_png" bottom="0"  anchorOffsetX="375" anchorOffsetY="55.5" x="375"/>
    <e:Image id="leaves2" source="p_end_leaves_png" top="0"  anchorOffsetX="375" anchorOffsetY="115" x="375"/>
	<e:Group id="score_con" x="61.22" y="133.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="343" width="632">
		<e:Image id="star0" source="p_end_star_png" anchorOffsetX="115.5" anchorOffsetY="111" rotation="335.87" x="153" y="145" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="star1" source="p_end_star_png" y="0" x="198.78" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="star2" source="p_end_star_png" anchorOffsetX="115.5" anchorOffsetY="111" rotation="25.61" x="479" y="145" visible="false"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="score" height="87" y="264.67" font="p_score_fnt" text="1675" x="236.78"/>
	</e:Group>
    <e:Group id="btnCon" anchorOffsetX="0" width="622" anchorOffsetY="0" height="238" x="64" bottom="139">
        <e:Image id="btn" source="p_download_png" rotation="360" anchorOffsetX="210" anchorOffsetY="60" x="311" y="119" />
    </e:Group>
	<com:ComMovieClip id="logo" width="1000" height="1000" anchorOffsetX="500" anchorOffsetY="500" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>
